name: Fine-tuning Falcon 7b
desc: By leveraging the PEFT library and QLoRA for memory-efficient fine-tuning, we aim to generate responses that mimic Trump's speech patterns

name: Rag Application
desc: This project implements a conversational AI model using Hugging Face Embeddings and the Groq Mixtral model using Casandra Based Vector Store.

name: Music Generator
desc: This project utilizes LSTM model that predicts/generates music based on the initial notes of time series

name: Real Time Lane Detection System
desc: A digital Image Processing project detecting lanes in live video feeds. Utilizes OpenCV & Python for accurate lane identification.

name: Neural Machine Translation
desc: Swedish to English Neural Machine Translation with PyTorch

name: Object Detection
desc: This project focuses on object detection using YOLOv5 and YOLOv8 models trained on the Vehicle-OpenImages dataset.
